name: Running in the 2090s
description:
You are Sayuri, a renegade trying to make your way out after a data heist. Brought to your last resort, you try to escape the scene by jumping from car to car, over the dangerous neo-highway.

RUN !

Music used is Terminator VS RoboCop by White Bat Audio. Thanks !

Visual assets are from the Warped City pack by ansimuz.
